## 1. BRFSS Analysis (Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System)

The goals of this exercise are:

-   Practice pair programming
-   Solve some problems using your current R knowledge

Some of the functions you may need to use are listed below. Remember, you can find more information about them in the R documentation or Google it!

|                   |                            |
|-------------------|----------------------------|
| `source()`        | `[]` (subsetting operator) |
| `str()`           | `$` (extractor operator)   |
| `summary()`       | `plot()`                   |
| `mean()`          | `hist()`                   |
| `IQR()`           | `tapply()`                 |
| `data.frame()`    | `aggregate()`              |
| `table()`         | `boxplot()`                |
| `as.data.frame()` | `c()`                      |
| `names()`         | `sum()`                    |
